name: Bobs Cowbob Adventure
description:
Bob has gotten himself into trouble again. Use A, S and D to move around. Try your best to dodge the bullets from Clint, Marvin and Harry. They will point to where they are going to shoot every 3 seconds. They will always miss one spot so try to go to that spot. If you dodge 6 shot you can either run away and take save your score or continue and try to get even more points :).

Art by Lauwe T:

https://www.instagram.com/lauwe.t/

https://laubast.tumblr.com/

Programming and Unity work by Harmey:

https://twitter.com/hammiekaaz

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_uqrmnZi1DaF4_-4hj6img?view_as=subscriber

Thanks for Playing!!!
